item.description:
OK. Third meeting! More members show up every time = good sign!! Back at my house this time, the Idle Dog, 15 Glendale Street, Maynard, MA 01754. 978-973-7855. Deb Muise. 1pm till whenever.

This time we will discuss combining winter meetings with the Sudbury Small Breed Dogs Meetup usually held at Best Friends on the third Wednesday of every month. We'll need a new name: (The Universal Small Dog Meetup Group?, the Milky Way Small Dog meetup group?? Tiny Paws? Petite Paws?? I'm getting carried away here...). $1 requested fee this time to cover $20/month membership fee and goodies expenses.

Obvious holiday theme, of course. Dress your dog in any appropriate outfit, if you can. I will take a million pictures this time. I'll also have various holiday treats for humans and dogs. All welcome. Guests with 4 feet must be under 40 lbs.

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs December Meetup
